alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued May 12 at 12:35AM EDT until May 12 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Around one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Surry, James City, Isle of Wight, and York Counties...in addition to the City of Newport News. * WHEN...Until noon EDT today. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline resulting in a low threat of property damage. Expect around one foot of water above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks and lawns near the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 11/09 PM 4.4 2.2 2.4 1 MINOR 12/09 AM 4.3 2.1 2.5 1 MINOR 12/10 PM 4.2 2.0 2.0 1 MINOR 13/10 AM 3.6 1.4 1.8 1 NONE 13/11 PM 3.8 1.6 1.4 1 NONE 14/11 AM 3.0 0.8 1.2 1 NONE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 11/06 PM 4.7 1.9 2.2 3-4 MINOR 12/07 AM 4.6 1.8 2.2 3 MINOR 12/07 PM 4.5 1.7 1.8 3 MINOR 13/07 AM 3.8 1.0 1.4 2 NONE 13/08 PM 4.0 1.2 1.1 1 NONE 14/08 AM 3.5 0.7 1.0 1 NONE YORKTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 2.4 FT, MAJOR 2.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 11/06 PM 4.2 1.6 1.9 1 NONE 12/07 AM 4.3 1.7 2.1 1 NONE 12/07 PM 4.5 1.9 2.0 1 MINOR 13/08 AM 3.8 1.2 1.5 1 NONE 13/08 PM 4.0 1.4 1.2 1 NONE 14/08 AM 3.6 1.0 1.2 1 NONE FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 11/06 PM 4.6 1.8 2.1 4 MINOR 12/07 AM 4.5 1.7 2.1 3 MINOR 12/07 PM 4.6 1.8 1.8 3 MINOR 13/08 AM 3.8 1.0 1.3 2 NONE 13/08 PM 4.1 1.3 1.1 1 NONE 14/08 AM 3.4 0.6 0.9 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
